name: AbsenceOfCervixObservation
title: Absence of cervix observation
description: This value set has not been tested in a clinical environment. Please use with caution.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Acquired absence of the cervix via previous surgeries, observed absence of cervix),(Data Element Scope: SNOMED CT "finding" and "situation" codes that represent a history of previous surgeries which removed the cervix, along with physical assessment/observation finding(s) of an absence of the cervix),(Inclusion Criteria: SNOMED CT "finding" and "situation" codes that represent a history of previous surgeries which removed the cervix, along with physical assessment/observation finding(s) of an absence of the cervix),(Exclusion Criteria: Other types of SNOMED CT concepts (e.g., "disorder") that represent similar observations.)

concept.display: History of total hysterectomy without abnormal cervical Papanicolaou smear (situation)
History of total hysterectomy with bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy (situation)

contains.display: History of total hysterectomy without abnormal cervical Papanicolaou smear (situation)
